name: Pilldemic
description:
College Game Jam

Use WASD to move and E to talk with characters. Play minigames to earn money, and talk with characters to garner their support. 

This game is buggy! Do not play the driving minigame more than once. Once you earn $300, you should progress to next cutscene telling you you've paid your bills. If this doesn't work, please keep playing the minigames or reset the game entirely.
